The Lego Movie (2014) is a funny and quirky movie about an ordinary LEGO construction worker recruited to join a quest to stop an evil tyrant. It's a great movie for fans of fantasy and animation.

Gladiator (2000) is an epic historical drama about a gladiator fighting to avenge his family's death. It's a powerful and moving movie with stunning visuals and a great cast.

A Farewell to Arms (1929) is a tragic love story about an English nurse and an American ambulance driver on the Italian front during World War 1. It's a heartbreaking and unforgettable film that will stay with you long after you watch it.
